title: Large 2 Bedroom Latin Quarter
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Big Parisian classic apartment of the 19th century, Haussmann style,.Parquets, mouldings, fireplaces and mirror in every room. Double glazing in all the rooms looking onto street. Chamber and kitchen on quiet courtyard.
Warm decoration classic updated and exotic touches.
Lively area, ideally situated in the southern part of Saint Germain des Prés not far neither from Montparnasse, near the big places of interest, the museum and the monuments and the Mecca of the shopping.
Numerous restaurant and bars in 5 min (see list recommendations)
A market boulevard Raspail on Tuesday and Fridays and biological market everything every Sunday morning. (1 min on foot)
Books: FNAC street of Rennes in 5 min on foot. Numerous bookshops to Saint Germain of near-
Grand Patissiers, chocolate makers and glaciers(ice-cream makers) in 5-10 min (see list)
Numerous théatres (District Montparnasse and Théâtre de l'Odéon) and Cinemas (Montparnasse-odéon) (Very favorite : Cinema tearoom the Pagoda 57 street of Babylon)
Parksfor children: garden of the Luxembourg in 10 on foot.
Garden of the convent, 33 street of Babylon (small very quiet ideal, authorized garden, lawns for children) in 10 min
There is no cleaning fee as long as the guest leaves the apartment tidy (dishes washed and put away, surfaces cleaned).
